attributes.action: Change the age limit of social media accounts to 16
attributes.background: Please sign this petition to up the age limit to 16 to have a social media account to try stop the so called bullying craze that's currently going on and to reduce the amount of young people having to deal with the non stop bullying all day everyday

rejection.details:
At the moment, age policies are the responsibility of social media sites.

If you would like Parliament to change the law, to make it illegal to offer social media accounts to children under 16, then you could start a petition asking for that.
